peersim.bittorrent
Class BitTorrent

java.lang.Object
  peersim.bittorrent.BitTorrent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Cloneable, peersim.core.Protocol, peersim.edsim.EDProtocol
public class BitTorrent
extends java.lang.Object
implements peersim.edsim.EDProtocol

This is the class that implements the BitTorrent module for Peersim

                         int pid,

The standard method that processes incoming events.

processEvent in interface peersim.edsim.EDProtocol
Parameters:
node - reference to the local node for which the event is going to be processed
pid - BitTorrent's protocol id
event - the event to process

setCompleted

public void setCompleted(int number)
Used by NodeInitializer to set the number of piece completed from the beginning in according with the distribution in the configuration file.

Parameters:
number - the number of piece completed

setStatus

public void setStatus(int index,
                      int value)
Sets the status (the set of blocks) of the file for the current node. Note that a piece is considered completed if the number of downloaded blocks is 16.

Parameters:
index - The index of the piece
value - Number of blocks downloaded for the piece index.

setPeerStatus

public void setPeerStatus(int status)
Sets the status of the local node.

Parameters:
status - The status of the node: 1 means seeder, 0 leecher

getPeerStatus

public int getPeerStatus()
Gets the status of the local node.

Returns:
The status of the local node: 1 means seeder, 0 leecher

getStatus

public int getStatus(int index)
Gets the number of blocks for a given piece owned by the local node.

Parameters:
index - The index of the piece
Returns:
Number of blocks downloaded for the piece index

setBandwidth

public void setBandwidth(int value)
Sets the maximum bandwdith for the local node.

Parameters:
value - The value of bandwidth in Kbps

alive

public boolean alive(peersim.core.Node node)
Checks if a node is still alive in the simulated network.

Parameters:
node - The node to check
Returns:
true if the node node is up, false otherwise
See Also:
GeneralNode.isUp()

addNeighbor

public boolean addNeighbor(peersim.core.Node neighbor)
Adds a neighbor to the cache of the local node. The new neighbor is put in the first null position.

Parameters:
neighbor - The neighbor node to add
Returns:
false if the neighbor is already present in the cache (this can happen when the peer requests a new peer set to the tracker an there is still this neighbor within) or no place is available. Otherwise, returns true if the node is correctly added to the cache.

removeNeighbor

public boolean removeNeighbor(peersim.core.Node neighbor)
Removes a neighbor from the cache of the local node.

Parameters:
neighbor - The node to remove
Returns:
true if the node is correctly removed, false otherwise.

getNPieces

public int getNPieces()
Returns the file's size as number of pieces of 256KB.

Returns:
number of pieces that compose the file.

clone

public java.lang.Object clone()
Clone method of the class. Returns a deep copy of the BitTorrent class. Used by the simulation to initialize the Network

Specified by:
clone in interface peersim.core.Protocol
Overrides:
clone in class java.lang.Object
Returns:
the deep copy of the BitTorrent class.

sortByPeer

public void sortByPeer()
Sorts byPeer array by peer's ID. It implements the InsertionSort algorithm.

sortByBandwidth

public void sortByBandwidth()
Sorts the array byBandwidth using QuickSort algorithm. null elements and seeders are moved to the end of the array.

search

public peersim.bittorrent.Element search(long ID)
Searches the node with the given ID. It does a dychotomic search.

Parameters:
ID - ID of the node to search.
Returns:
the Element in byPeer which represents the node with the given ID.
